title: Black Countess - Discography (1999-2007) [mp3@VBR]
description:
<a href="http://www.blackcountess.ru/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.blackcountess.ru/</a>

Black, Doom/Gothic Band from Ulyanowsk (Russia)

Current line-up Ilya Polagushin - Guitars, vocals, bass, keyboards 

Former/past member(s) 
Sergey Shepochkin - Drums
Radik Velikov - Drums
Aleksandr Somov - Guitar
Katerina Polevina - Female Voice on "Queen of Winter"
Kate Black - female vocals on "Blood, Desire and Dead Nenuphars"
Mikhail Antonov - Bass
Dmitriy Martyanov - Guitars 

 <a href="
http://www.blackcountess.ru/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.blackcountess.ru/</a>
